document_data.name: Marines of the Seven Seas
document_data.orgname: the Marines of the Seven Seas
document_data.mainbody: The '''Marines of the Seven Seas''', who were also simply called the '''Marines''', was a sect of followers of [[Valkur]], the Captain of the Waves.
document_data.Description: The Marines of the Seven Seas formed a small navy of various war ships stationed at different ports within the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] and along the [[Sea of Swords]]. The Marines hunted down monsters of the deep in Valkur's name. Many kills were credited to them including [[dragon turtle]]s, [[kraken]]s, [[giant octopi]], [[morkoth]]s, [[quelzarn]]s, [[vurgens]], and more.
